description: Vernan Kee designs, in collaboration with Natives Outdoors to empower Indigenous communities, bring their craft and love of getting outside to this beanie. Featuring an originally designed patch, the double-layer knit construction helps keep your head warm and cozy through all kinds of conditions. The benefits of Merino wool and the durability of polyester ensure this beanie keeps up for more snow days to come.
name: Chasing Mountains Patch Beanie
